Question: World Home Dr. co., ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
World Home Dr. co., ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

Dreame X30 Ultra robot vacuum and mop

- Anti-tangle feature
- 8000Pa suction power
- Dual oscillating mop heads
- Automatic carpet detection
- Available for preorder at early bird special of $1,240

Roborock S8 Max series

- Available in April 2024
- Alternative refill and drainage system
- Connects to a home's water supply

Ecovacs Deebot X2 Combo

- Available at the end of March for $1,599
- Omni station functions as a charging dock for a new Ecovacs handheld stick vacuum

EcoFlow Delta Pro Ultra

- Largest portable battery to date
- Delta Pro Ultra with 6kWh capacity
- Stackable with up to five batteries under each inverter
- Introductory price of $4,999

Lockly Visage Facial Recognition Smart Lock

- Supports facial recognition technology
- Also supports fingerprint reader, Apple Home Key, keypad, and physical key
- Matter-enabled smart lock available this summer for $349
Summary_cn:
新世界家庭有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

Dreame X30 Ultra机器人吸尘器和拖把

- 防缠绕功能
- 8000Pa吸力
- 双摇摆式拖把头
- 自动识别地毯
- 提前预定特价1240美元

Roborock S8 Max系列

- 2024年4月上市
- 备用水贮存和排水系统
- 可连接家庭供水系统

Ecovacs Deebot X2 Combo

- 3月底上市，售价1599美元
- 综合站作为新Ecovacs手持式吸尘器的充电座

EcoFlow Delta Pro Ultra

- 创造至今最大的便携式电池
- Delta Pro Ultra容量6kWh
- 每个逆变器下最多可叠放五块电池
- 介绍价格4999美元

Lockly Visage人脸识别智能锁

- 支持人脸识别技术
- 也支持指纹识别器，Apple Home Key，键盘和物理钥匙
- Matter智能锁将于今年夏季上市，售价349美元
